Articles.Content: i downloaded some mods on twitch, but i didn't like them so i uninstalled them (with twitch), but they are still there in kerbal. can someone help?

Delete the mod folders from KSP/GameData- keep Squad (and SquadExpansion if you have the DLCs) but delete all the folders for the mods you don't want and leave those that you do.

Edited November 14, 2020 by jimmymcgoochie
